data.name: PongPong Girl
data.detailed_description:
Nice to meet you! During this special time, how is everything going?



Cube Starman suddenly attack, and you've stepped up in order to protect the world!



After a white-hot battle, it's time to relax!
Come and meet the girls who adore you and show them your charm!

Shoot, Smash, Level up, Collect items.

FEATURES


  • Crush all the Cube Starman！
  • Private dates with 4 girls with different personalities!
  • Random levels.
  • Learn to upgrade 16 special abilities so that you can be more flexible in the battle.
  • Unlock collections through responding to the girls' various questions, interact more!
  • Review the unlocked dating scenes in the photo album.
  • 80+ Achievements

data.short_description: PongPong Girl is a new Breakout game, with a sprinkle of RPG. Have a beautiful encounte with girls!
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 10.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content
